They frequ_____ work clo____ together o_ projects, and Nate has n__ been consi______ in sha____ credit f__ the wo__. We ha__ been encou______ Karim t_ stand u_ for him____ in busi____ meetings. data.fullContent: It's clear that Karim's hatred for Nate goes beyond jealousy. They frequently work closely together on projects, and Nate has not been considering in sharing credit for the work. We have been encouraging Karim to stand up for himself in business meetings. So far, he has been reluctant to do so, but this project may cause a total breakdown in their relationship.
data.answer: 很明显，卡里姆对内特的恨已经超越了嫉妒。他们经常在项目上紧密合作，而Nate从来没有考虑过分享功劳。我们一直鼓励卡里姆在商务会议上为自己说话。到目前为止，他一直不愿意这样做，但这个项目可能会导致他们的关系完全崩溃。
